This version of iTunes Movie Trailers provides the following improvements:

• You can now choose HD or SD quality while viewing a trailer on iPhone and iPod touch with Retina display and iPad
• Video playback has been improved—it now takes less t

This version of iTunes Movie Trailers improves performance and provides additional bug fixes.
This version of iTunes Movie Trailers improves performance and provides additional bug fixes.

This update includes the following improvements:

• Add a movie to Favorites to be notified when it debuts in theaters or becomes available in the iTunes Store
• Read critic reviews provided by Rotten Tomatoes for movies that are in theaters, rig
